location.name: VXLab Entrance
location.note: Frame of reference for VXLab objects, relative to midpoint of entry doors
location.description: The VXLab is entered through double sliding doors on its West side
location.coordinate_system: GPS, everything while be based of this, this is the 0,0,0

location.name: Vivi
location.description: Vivi runs on a 32 inch and/or 60 inch holographic display
location.coordinate_system: relative, user will entre a GPS location and arthimatic calculations will be done, based off this location

location.name: Flight Sim
location.description: This is the flight simulator within the VXLab
location.coordinate_system: GPS location, We will enter the location of the flight sim.
